title: Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses, Android TV Smart Glasses with 360" Micro-OLED Display, Google Play, Media Streaming, HDCP Support & Cloud Gaming, Console, Android, iOS, Windows Compatible
descriptions:
Immerse yourself in a world of endless entertainment with the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses! These cutting-edge Android TV smart glasses feature a stunning 360" Micro-OLED display, making every viewing experience truly immersive. With Google Play and support for popular streaming services like Hulu, Disney+, and Peacock, you'll have access to all your favorite content right at your fingertips. And with cloud gaming support, you can take your gaming experience to the next level.

Not only do these glasses offer incredible entertainment options, but they also prioritize your comfort and convenience. Weighing only 75g, they are lightweight and comfortable to wear for extended periods. Plus, with TüV Rheinland Eye Comfort certification and a diopter adjustment range from 0.00D to -6.00D, you can enjoy crystal-clear visuals without straining your eyes.

The Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses are compatible with Android, iOS, and Windows, and offer versatile connectivity options including USB-C, HDMI adapter, and wireless adapter. With support for HDCP and Android TV 12, these glasses are truly the ultimate companion for all your media and gaming needs. Elevate your entertainment experience with the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses!

Step into the future with the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses! Immerse yourself in a 360" Micro-OLED display, compatible with Android, iOS, and Windows platforms. With access to popular streaming services like Hulu, Disney+, and Peacock, and Google Play, you can enjoy your favorite media with ease. The TüV Rheinland Eye Comfort certification and diopter adjustment range ensure maximum comfort for your eyes. Plus, with support for cloud gaming and connectivity options like USB-C, HDMI adapter, and wireless adapter, this is the ultimate smart glasses experience. Upgrade your entertainment and gaming experience with the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses today!
